upload_drag_title: Click or drag file to this area to upload
upload_drag_hint: Support for a single Excel (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV file.
upload_error_no_type: Please select an import type first.
upload_error_processing: An error occurred while processing the file.
upload_error_reading: An error occurred while reading the file.
preview_header_checkbox: The first row of the file is a header
mapping_step_title: Map Your Data to Grispi Fields
mapping_error_contact_desc: For 'Contact' import type, please ensure you map either the 'Email' or 'Phone' field.
mapping_error_generic_desc: Please map all required fields for the '{{importType}}' import type.
validation_error_desc_intro: Found errors in a total of {{count}} rows. Here are the first few examples:
validation_error_desc_outro: Please correct your file or click "Proceed Anyway" to ignore the incorrect rows.
summary_step_description: Below is a summary of the mapping. Please review the information before proceeding.
summary_alert_description: Your file contains {{count}} rows with errors. Incorrect rows will not be included in the import.
result_alert_success_desc: All {{count}} rows have been successfully validated and are ready to be imported.
result_alert_warning_desc: {{successCount}} rows successful, {{failedCount}} rows failed. Only successful rows will be available for download.
result_json_preview_desc: Below is a JSON preview of only the successfully mapped data.
result_no_successful_data: No successful data to preview or download.
